programme.desc: Chuck and Fluffy showing us some funny dog videos, the Ninja Gorilla shows us how to make a dog out of balloons, Mamma O tells us a story about an old dog, and we dance and freeze with an otter.

programme.title: Animal Noises
programme.desc: Think you can speak like an orangutan? Or talk like an elephant? Then join Rocky and friends in the ultimate noisy guessing game, where kids roar, honk, hiss or squawk. Can you guess what animal makes the noise before Rocky or the gang?

programme.title: Draw It
programme.desc: Say Bonjour to Lemur. Hes artistic, talented, emotional, and he is very French. His mission is to create a portrait of the worlds wonderful wildlife, one creature at a time.

programme.title: Whats The Difference?
programme.desc: Join Afrina, Hanna, Panda and friends on ZooMoo to play our fun game show, Whats The Difference?. Did you know whales, monkeys and scorpions all have tails, but that they use them to do different things? Or that snails, snakes and naked mole rats all use different senses when they cant see very well? Did you know that ostriches, penguins and owls all have feathers, but that their feathers are all different for different reasons? Play Whats The Difference? with the ZooMoo crew and discover why animals think its cool to be different! Play Whats The Difference? with the ZooMoo crew and discover why animals think its cool to be different!

programme.title: Star Of The Day
programme.desc: Join Rocky Raccoon as he meets some of the worlds most talented performing animals. This months celebritites include a parrot called Mango who dances like a ballerina, and somersaulting Smashie the border collie.

programme.title: Star Of The Day
programme.desc: Join Rocky Raccoon as he meets some of the worlds most talented performing animals. This months celebritites include a parrot called Mango who dances like a ballerina, and somersaulting Smashie the border collie.

programme.title: Sculpt It!
programme.desc: Heres a recipe for fun Take one clump of clay add a little Lemur a lot of imagination and the sit back and watch some seriously amazing sculptures! Join Lemur as he pushes, prods and pounds his crazy creations into life. Can you guess what animal hes sculpting today?Lemur gets creative with a lump of clay and sculpts a masterpiece. Applicable to all episodes

programme.title: Animal All Stars S2
programme.desc: Todays show is all about big cats and wild dogs!

programme.title: Storytime
programme.desc: Baby Os favourite part of the day is when his mum sits down with him for Storytime. Join Mamma O and Baby O every day to hear a fabulous story!
